At the Hotel.english: 1. Can I make a reservation for two nights?
At the Hotel.italian: Posso fare una prenotazione per due notti?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Puedo hacer una reserva para dos noches?
At the Hotel.german: Kann ich für zwei Nächte reservieren?

At the Hotel.english: 2. Is breakfast included in the room rate?
At the Hotel.italian: La colazione è inclusa nel prezzo della camera?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿El desayuno está incluido en el precio de la habitación?
At the Hotel.german: Ist das Frühstück im Zimmerpreis inbegriffen?

At the Hotel.english: 3. Could you please bring me some extra towels?
At the Hotel.italian: Potresti per favore portarmi degli asciugamani extra?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Podrías por favor traerme unas toallas adicionales?
At the Hotel.german: Könnten Sie mir bitte zusätzliche Handtücher bringen?

At the Hotel.english: 4. Where is the nearest bus stop?
At the Hotel.italian: Dove si trova la fermata dell'autobus più vicina?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Dónde está la parada de autobús más cercana?
At the Hotel.german: Wo ist die nächste Bushaltestelle?

At the Hotel.english: 5. Excuse me, there seems to be a problem with the air conditioning.
At the Hotel.italian: Mi scusi, sembra esserci un problema con l'aria condizionata.
At the Hotel.spanish: Disculpe, parece haber un problema con el aire acondicionado.
At the Hotel.german: Entschuldigung, es scheint ein Problem mit der Klimaanlage zu geben.

At the Hotel.english: 6. I would like to check out, please.
At the Hotel.italian: Vorrei fare il check-out, per favore.
At the Hotel.spanish: Me gustaría hacer el check-out, por favor.
At the Hotel.german: Ich möchte auschecken, bitte.

At the Hotel.english: 7. What time is the check-in?
At the Hotel.italian: A che ora si può fare il check-in?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿A qué hora es el check-in?
At the Hotel.german: Um wie viel Uhr ist der Check-in?

At the Hotel.english: 8. Do you have a room with a view?
At the Hotel.italian: Avete una camera con vista?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Tienen una habitación con vista?
At the Hotel.german: Haben Sie ein Zimmer mit Aussicht?

At the Hotel.english: 9. Can I have the WiFi password, please?
At the Hotel.italian: Posso avere la password del WiFi, per favore?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Puede darme la contraseña del WiFi, por favor?
At the Hotel.german: Kann ich bitte das WLAN-Passwort haben?

At the Hotel.english: 10. Is there a fitness center in the hotel?
At the Hotel.italian: C'è un centro fitness nell'hotel?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Hay un centro de fitness en el hotel?
At the Hotel.german: Gibt es ein Fitnesscenter im Hotel?

At the Hotel.english: 11. Are pets allowed in the rooms?
At the Hotel.italian: Sono ammessi animali domestici nelle stanze?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Se permiten mascotas en las habitaciones?
At the Hotel.german: Sind Haustiere in den Zimmern erlaubt?

At the Hotel.english: 12. Could you please call me a taxi?
At the Hotel.italian: Potresti per favore chiamarmi un taxi?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Podrías llamarme un taxi, por favor?
At the Hotel.german: Könnten Sie mir bitte ein Taxi rufen?

At the Hotel.english: 13. What is the cost per night?
At the Hotel.italian: Qual è il costo per notte?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Cuál es el costo por noche?
At the Hotel.german: Was kostet eine Übernachtung?

At the Hotel.english: 14. Is there a restaurant in the hotel?
At the Hotel.italian: C'è un ristorante nell'hotel?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Hay un restaurante en el hotel?
At the Hotel.german: Gibt es ein Restaurant im Hotel?

At the Hotel.english: 15. Can I pay with a credit card?
At the Hotel.italian: Posso pagare con una carta di credito?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Puedo pagar con tarjeta de crédito?
At the Hotel.german: Kann ich mit Kreditkarte bezahlen?

At the Hotel.english: 16. Do you provide room service?
At the Hotel.italian: Offrite il servizio in camera?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Ofrecen servicio de habitaciones?
At the Hotel.german: Bieten Sie Zimmerservice an?

At the Hotel.english: 17. Can I have an extra pillow, please?
At the Hotel.italian: Posso avere un cuscino extra, per favore?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Puedo tener una almohada adicional, por favor?
At the Hotel.german: Kann ich bitte ein zusätzliches Kissen haben?

At the Hotel.english: 18. How far is the nearest train station?
At the Hotel.italian: Quanto dista la stazione ferroviaria più vicina?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿A qué distancia está la estación de tren más cercana?
At the Hotel.german: Wie weit ist der nächste Bahnhof entfernt?

At the Hotel.english: 19. Is there a swimming pool in the hotel?
At the Hotel.italian: C'è una piscina nell'hotel?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Hay una piscina en el hotel?
At the Hotel.german: Gibt es einen Swimmingpool im Hotel?

At the Hotel.english: 20. Can I have a wake-up call at 7 am, please?
At the Hotel.italian: Posso avere una sveglia alle 7 del mattino, per favore?
At the Hotel.spanish: ¿Pueden llamarme a las 7 am, por favor?
At the Hotel.german: Kann ich bitte um 7 Uhr geweckt werden?
